comments: Oubre Jr. (CHA) makes contact with the ball, but also with Wood's (HOU) arm and affects his dunk attempt.
All Technical Fouls are reviewed by League Operations.
Wood (HOU) cleanly blocks Ball's (CHA) driving shot attempt.

After the blocked shot, Ball (CHA) inadvertently makes contact with Wood's (HOU) face.   Contact to an opponent?s head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Gordon (HOU) briefly grabs and releases Rozier's (CHA) arm during the drive and the contact is marginal.
Rozier (CHA) makes contact with Porter Jr.'s (CHA) arm at the start of the drive but the contact is marginal.
Hayward (CHA) makes contact with Mathews' (HOU) body that affects his jump shot attempt.
Rozier (CHA) releases the pass before returning to the floor.
Porter Jr. (HOU) establishes himself in a legal guarding position and Oubre Jr. (CHA) drifts forward into him when marginal contact occurs.
Washington (CHA) makes contact with Porter Jr.'s (HOU) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) extends his legs to create the leg contact as Wood (HOU) contests his jump shot attempt.

Replay review of the foul on Ball (CHA) pursuant to a coach's challenge is deemed successful.  Although Tate (HOU) establishes himself in a legal guarding position outside of the RA, Ball releases the pass and the contact with Tate is marginal.  The whistle for the foul call occurred after the successful basket by Brides (CHA), therefore the basket is counted.
Mathews (HOU) brushes Rozier's (CHA) foot during the closeout because Rozier overtly kicks out and the contact is marginal.
Ball (CHA) makes contact with Mathews' (HOU) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) slides his pivot foot at the start of his dribble.
Replay review of the foul on Porter Jr. (HOU) pursuant to a coach's challenge is deemed unsuccessful.  Porter Jr. makes contact to Bridges' (CHA) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
Martin (CHA) quickly wraps and releases Wood's (HOU) waist as he releases screening position and the contact doesn't affect his FOM.
Martin (CHA) is not in a legal guarding position when contact occurs as Gordon (HOU) steps forward during his driving shot attempt.
Porter Jr. (HOU) makes marginal contact to Ball's (CHA) body at the end of his drive that doesn't affect his SBQR.
Ball (CHA) commits a take foul on Porter Jr. (HOU).
